name: rankuniss

stmt.origin: a1ii(wss(cfv(crnk, cuni(c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(crnk, cuni(c0)), cfv(crnk, c0))
-| wss(cfv(crnk, cuni(c0)), cfv(crnk, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ (rank ` ⋃ c0)⊆(rank ` c0)
⊣ (rank ` ⋃ c0)⊆(rank ` c0)
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
